text: This is a list of airports in Malawi, sorted by location. __TOC__ == Airports == Airport names shown in bold indicate the airport has scheduled service on commercial airlines. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- valign=baseline ! style="text-align:left;" | City served ! style="text-align:left;" | ICAO ! style="text-align:left;" | IATA ! style="text-align:left;" | Airport name |- valign=top | Blantyre || FWCL || BLZ || Chileka International Airport |- valign=top | Chelinda || FWCD || CEH || Chelinda Airport |- valign=top | Chitipa || FWCT || || Chitipa Airport |- valign=top | Club Makokola || FWCM || CMK || Club Makokola Airport |- valign=top | Dwanga || FWDW || DWA || Dwanga Airport |- valign=top | Karonga || FWKA || KGJ || Karonga Airport |- valign=top | Kasungu || FWKG || KBQ || Kasungu Airport |- valign=top | Kasungu || FWLP || || Lifupa Airport |- valign=top | Katumbi || FWKB || || Katumbi Airport (Closed) |- valign=top | Likoma || FWLK || LIX || Likoma Airport |- valign=top | Lilongwe || FWKI || LLW || Lilongwe International Airport (Kamuzu Int'l) |- valign=top | Liwonde || FWMK || VUU || Liwonde Makanga Aerodrome |- valign=top | Mangochi || FWMG || MAI || Mangochi Airport |- valign=top | Mchinji || FWMC || || Mchinji Airport |- valign=top | Monkey Bay || FWMY || MYZ || Monkey Bay Airport |- valign=top | Mzuzu || FWUU || ZZU || Mzuzu Airport |- valign=top | Nchalo || FWSU || || Sucoma Airport |- valign=top | Nsanje || FWSJ || || Nsanje Airport |- valign=top | Ntchisi || FWCS || || Ntchisi Airport |- valign=top | Salima || FWSM || LMB || Salima Airport |- valign=top | Zomba || FWZA || || Zomba Airport |} == See also == * Transport in Malawi * List of airports by ICAO code: F#FW – Malawi * Wikipedia: WikiProject Aviation/Airline destination lists: Africa#Malawi == References == * * - includes IATA codes * Great Circle Mapper: Airports in Malawi - IATA and ICAO codes * World Aero Data: Malawi - ICAO codes Malawi Airports Airports Malawi
